```{julia}
using Terra
using Ipaper
using YAXArrays

dir_root = "/mnt/z/GitHub/jl-spatial/Whittaker2.jl/scripts/Project_Global_LAI_smoothing"
indir = "$dir_root/OUTPUT/global_param_lambda_cv"

fs = dir(indir, "zarr")
f = fs[1]

ds = open_dataset(f)
```

## 读取lambda，转为tiff

### 方案1: tiles

```{julia}
for f in fs
  prefix = gsub(basename(f), ".zarr", "")
  ds = open_dataset(f)
  st_ds2tiff(ds; prefix, overwrite=false)
end
```

### 方案2: 拼接为一个大的tiff

```{julia}
## 手动拼，保证结果的正确性
# 并行的方式读数据，然后进行拼接
@time res = read_ds(ds; index=[:, :, 1]);
@time ra = st_mosaic(res, missingval=0);

fout = "lambda_cv_2000-2004.tif"
@time write(fout, ra;
  options=Dict("COMPRESS" => "DEFLATE"), force=true)
```

## upload to gee

metadata的格式:

> id_no,xsize,ysize,num_bands
> lambda_cv_2018-2022_grid1_3,28800,7200,1

```{julia}
run(`./gee_upload.sh`)
```

```{julia}
col_org = "projects/gee-hydro/MODIS_Terra_LAI/global_param_lambda_cv"
col_new = "projects/gee-hydro/MODIS_Terra_LAI/param_lambda_cv/lambda_cv_2018_2022"

run(`geeadd move --initial $col_org --final $col_new`)
```
